short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the SEO Rank for any website you visit - the most accurate web ranking metric on the planet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the world's leading algorithm for ranking websites, the Website Rank Checker from Intently.co instantly shows the rank of the website you are currently viewing.

Scores range from 0-1000, with 0 being a site that is new to the web with no established Internet present, and scores of 700 and above for household names.  Small businesses tend to fall in the 100-500 range.

With an account on Intently.co, you will also be able to run competitor analysis, comparing the backlink profile for your web site vs any competitor.  Intently will even find the backlinks your competitor has that you do not, so you can close the gap.

This tool is similar to the MozBar from Moz, but our research has shown that it follows Google's algorithms more closely than Moz, so it produces more reliable scores.  We have found our Rank score to be more accurate than any other metric, including those from Moz, ahrefs, Majestic, SimilarWeb, Semrush and SiteChecker.

This tool is designed to be used primarily by SEO Consultants and small to medium sized business owners, especially those who offer service to the public such as:  catering, cleaning, entertainment, health, home services, lessons, photography, property services, venues and wedding services.
